channel.title: Need help with error connecting to server problem
channel.description: I keep getting the error cnnecting to server message when i try to log in to my server, i just started back creating servers and i am not quite sure what is wrong... I portforwarded my router, I have no-ip running, downloaded all of the new java software, so i am kinda at a loss to what it could be.. unless it has to do with the cache, but it is in my C:/. Can someone please help me out, I have been working on getting all of this going for about 2 hours now and I would be greatly appreciative.

item.title: Need help with error connecting to server problem
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

And you modified the IP in your client.java to connect to that IP?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with error connecting to server problem

I keep getting the error cnnecting to server message when i try to log in to my server, i just started back creating servers and i am not quite sure what is wrong… I portforwarded my router, I have no-ip running, downloaded all of the new java software, so i am kinda at a loss to what it could be… unless it has to do with the cache, but it is in my C:/. Can someone please help me out, I have been working on getting all of this going for about 2 hours now and I would be greatly appreciative.
